content: A deep cut into Split Federated Self-supervised Learning accepted to ECML PKDD 2024. See you in Vilnius!
RegFlow: Probabilistic Flow-based Regression for Future Prediction accepted to ACIIDS 2024!
I've been awarded the NCN PRELUDIUM 22 grant for project "Improving the transferability of self-supervised learning models"!
Augmentation-aware Self-Supervised Learning with Conditioned Projector accepted to Self-Supervised Learning - Theory and Practice workshop at NeurIPS 2023. See you in New Orleans!
Adapt Your Teacher: Improving Knowledge Distillation for Exemplar-free Continual Learning accepted to WACV 2024!
Zero time waste in pre-trained early exit neural networks published in the Neural Networks journal!
I have started an internship at Computer Vision Center with prof. Joost van de Weijer. Until December, see you in Barcelona!
Adapt Your Teacher: Improving Knowledge Distillation for Exemplar-free Continual Learning accepted to the 1st Workshop on Visual Continual Learning at ICCV 2023!
The general framework for few-shot learning by kernel HyperNetworks published in the Machine Vision and Applications journal!
HyperShot: Few-Shot Learning by Kernel HyperNetworks named a finalist of Paper Award at WACV 2023!
I have joined IDEAS NCBR, where I will work on Zero-Waste Machine Learning in Computer Vision in the group led by prof. Tomasz Trzci≈Ñski.
HyperShot: Few-Shot Learning by Kernel HyperNetworks accepted to WACV 2023!
MisConv: Convolutional Neural Networks for Missing Data accepted to WACV 2022!
"In time, you will call me Master." - I completed my Master's Degree at Jagiellonian University.
I was awarded the Polish Minister's of National Education and Science scholarship for best students. The scholarship was awarded to 362 best students in Poland.
